q: a credible jobs agenda without spending money. "One of the areas you want to focus on, and I hope and expect the Barack Obama will be talking about, is infrastructure," said Bernie Sanders . You have a crumbling infrastructure where over a period of years we need to spend trillions of dollars. When you do that you create jobs. Bernie Sanders called for investment in infrastructure and "sustainable energy and energy efficiency," which he called "good for the country." "It creates jobs as well," said Bernie Sanders ,
